info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued March 07 at 8:59AM PST until March 07 at 6:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST /7 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * WHERE...In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley. In Arizona, Lake Mead National Recreation Area and Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST /7 PM MST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds through this afternoon are expected over Lake Mohave.
info.instruction: Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.
